author: Special Correspondent
text:
The Mahakumbabishegam of Arulmigu Sri Bannari Amman Temple was witnessed by several thousands of devotees from various parts of Tamil Nadu and Karnataka.

The crowd was unexpectedly more since the kumbabishegam of the temple, administered by the HR and CE Department, was performed after a gap of 17 years, after renovation and facelift.

Heads of mutts, other religious leaders, people’s representatives and several dignitaries witnessed the kumbabishekam.
title: Mahakumbabishegam
